'''Hesperus' Boons''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[The Light of Day]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open 40 [[chests]] in [[Enkanomiya]].

==Trivia==
* {{w|Hesperus}} {{Lang|el=Ἕσπερος|el_rm=Hésperos}} is the personification of Venus as the Evening Star in Greek classical mythology. Its counterpart, {{w|Phosphorus (morning star)|Phosphorus}}, is Venus as the Morning Star, and is referenced in the achievements named [[Phosphoros' Guidance]].
